item.title: Tomato Time Estimation, Time Plan
item.description: PAPERS & WRITING # Action Time Description & Notice self-archive/publish 1 paper full-text online 2+ tomato 1h+, w/o code, GitHub + RG + Google scholar etc. converting 1 paper (A4, 2col, 11pages) from MS word to Latex 13 tomato 1 ~ 1.5 day reading 1 paper (qiqqa) 1 tomato average time for NEW papers, regardless of scanning or deep reading. scanning 3 papers (qiqqa) 1 tomato judge the paper relative or not, keywords & key procedure & key conclusion, citation points.
